CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(Event_Registered_Target__c), "Reg Target: " & " " /*invisible whitespace characters*/ & " --- Qual Regs: " &
IF( AND( Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c<100, Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c>9 ), " "&TEXT(Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c), IF( Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c<10, " "&TEXT(Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c) , TEXT(Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c) ) )
& " --- Guarantee: " & IF( AND( Event_Target__c<100, Event_Target__c>9 ), " "&TEXT(Event_Target__c), IF( Event_Target__c<10, " "&TEXT(Event_Target__c) , TEXT(Event_Target__c) ) ) , IF(Event_Registered_Target__c<100, "Reg Target: " & " " /*invisible whitespace character*/ & TEXT( Event_Registered_Target__c ) & " --- Qual Regs: " &
IF( AND( Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c<100, Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c>9 ), " "&TEXT(Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c), IF( Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c<10, " "&TEXT(Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c) , TEXT(Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c) ) )
& " --- Guarantee: " & IF( AND( Event_Target__c<100, Event_Target__c>9 ), " "&TEXT(Event_Target__c), IF( Event_Target__c<10, " "&TEXT(Event_Target__c) , TEXT(Event_Target__c) ) ) , "Reg Target: " & TEXT( Event_Registered_Target__c ) & " --- Qual Regs: " &
IF( AND( Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c<100, Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c>9 ), " "&TEXT(Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c), IF( Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c<10, " "&TEXT(Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c) , TEXT(Event_Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c) ) )
& " --- Guarantee: " & IF( AND( Event_Target__c<100, Event_Target__c>9 ), " "&TEXT(Event_Target__c), IF( Event_Target__c<10, " "&TEXT(Event_Target__c) , TEXT(Event_Target__c) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Registration Progress Summary
